meanings.definition: A tropical plant with large bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The gloxinia in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a potted gloxinia for my living room.
meanings.sent3: The gloxinia seemed to wave hello in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a blooming gloxinia.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the gloxinia filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The bright, showy flowers of the gloxinia plant.
meanings.sent1: Each petal of the gloxinia was a different shade of purple.
meanings.sent2: The gloxinia flowers added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent3: The gloxinia flowers danced in the sunlight like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as eye-catching as a bouquet of gloxinias.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hues of the gloxinia petals mesmerized onlookers.
